title: Expecting a loss already...
body:
So we get into champion select and our team looks good - Braum, Jinx, J4 and Wukong. Perfect for Yasuo, or AP Malphite, or something else with a small AoE nuke, right?

Our mid picks Gragas.

replies.body:
you know its a loss when 1 idiot goes to the forums to complain and rage before the game has started.

ever think maybe he doesnt play malph or yasuo? maybe he mains gragas and likes to play it?

> you know its a loss when 1 idiot goes to the forums to complain and rage before the game has started.
> 
> ever think maybe he doesnt play malph or yasuo? maybe he mains gragas and likes to play it? 

He said 'oh sh*t they stole my AP Ezreal' and proceeded to feed 4 kills in 8 minutes.

dude get over your self, i refuse to play ranked due to %%%%%%s like this one omg the champs would be great oh you  don't play them well, well im ganna %%%%% and throw a game because i think your stupid

> dude get over your self, i refuse to play ranked due to %%%%%%s like this one omg the champs would be great oh you  don't play them well, well im ganna %%%%% and throw a game because i think your stupid

Wut? I literally only posted this to the forums to vent my frustration so I DIDN'T snap and say it to the Gragas  himself. And apart from anything, I was the only one who did any good and I was up against a counter and got the wrong starting item to boot.

Tell him to nuke last or you'll report him.

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}

We didn't even get to mid-game. Bot and mid fed fantastically and surrendered at 20. Meanwhile I'm 4/1 on Wukong against Riven despite the fact that I accidentally started with a f*cking Doran's RIng.
Team composition doesn't matter in gold.

You dont matter in plat.

Rekt

Tell that to anyone who's ever had some dumb f*ck save several people with a dumb gragas ult/anivia wall/jarvan cataclysm when they should have almost certainly been obliterated by your perfectly-placed AoE ults.
